moreBlocks.articles:
• Car Accident
    Our law firm represents victims of Florida car accident claims. If you were injured in a car accident in Florida, call us for a free consultation as soon as possible to find out about important rights you may have.
  • Personal Injury
    Personal injury generally refers to any injury to the person caused by the negligence of another. It falls under Florida's tort law. If you were injured in Florida as a result of an accident or negligence, call Florida attorney Jason Turchin.
  • Crime Victims Rights
    Many crimes are often preventable. We are crime victim's rights advocates and attorneys who represent many crime victims.
  • Wrongful Death
    Florida wrongful death attorney Jason Turchin has represented many families who lost loved ones due to the negligence of another. If you lost a loved one and someone else may be at fault, call Jason Turchin for a free consultation at (800) 337-7755.
  • Cruise Injuries
    If you were injured on a cruise, you may be entitled to money damages and other damages if the cruise line was negligent and contributed to your injuries.

description:
I am attorney Jason Turchin, and I help clients who have sustained a personal injury due to the negligence of another, as well as advocate for the legal rights of crime victims. My law firm, the Law Offices of Jason Turchin has locations throughout southern Florida including Weston, Miami, Key West and Orlando, as well as satellite offices in New York City and Washington, D.C. My clients have come to expect high-caliber legal representation from a lawyer who has handled more than 4,500 accident and personal injury cases throughout his career. With every case I work on, I bring my extensive experience and ongoing dedication in order to obtain the best possible results and compensation for your legal situation.

If you have been injured in a car accident or sustained a personal injury on a cruise ship or by other means, I can help. If a loved one has been a victim of a wrongful death, I can help. If you have been the victim of a crime and have been harmed, I can help. When serious injury or death occurs to you or a family member, your world can change in an instant. It is imperative to retain a qualified law firm as soon as possible who can work on your behalf to get you the compensation you deserve. I provide comprehensive legal representation and focus on bringing your case to resolution, so you and your family can concentrate on healing. Even if you live outside of Florida but were injured in our state, my law firm's experience with the Florida legal system can be highly beneficial to your case.

The Law Offices of Jason Turchin offers free consultations to all personal injury and crime victim clients. Evening or weekend appointments are available upon request.
